testcase.classname: Retail Demo Application - I want to serach a product in the Product details screen and Add to Cart
testcase.name: Verify_the_customer_add_a_products_in_the_wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given I add "4" different product to my wish list...........................passed When I view my wishlist table...............................................passed Then I find total "4" selected items in my Wishlist.........................passed
